mapper.select: SELECT * FROM session_words WHERE session_id = #{sessionId} ORDER BY created_at
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO session_words (session_id, vocabulary_id, action_type, user_sentence, ai_feedback, score, question_type, question_data, created_at) VALUES (#{sessionId}, #{vocabularyId}, #{actionType}, #{userSentence}, #{aiFeedback}, #{score}, #{questionType}, #{questionData}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE session_words SET user_sentence = #{userSentence}, ai_feedback = #{aiFeedback}, score = #{score}, question_type = #{questionType}, question_data = #{questionData} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT sw.* FROM session_words sw JOIN learning_sessions ls ON sw.session_id = ls.id JOIN vocabulary v ON sw.vocabulary_id = v.id WHERE ls.user_id = #{userId} AND v.word_id = #{wordId} AND sw.action_type = 'sentence' AND sw.user_sentence IS NOT NULL ORDER BY sw.score DESC, sw.created_at DESC LIMIT 1
